title: Still getting prompted to sign into gmail
content: Hi! I think I've removed every tie to an old gmail account on thunderbird, and yet it still prompts me to sign in every time I open it - please help! What can I do to stop this?
creator: smartshoe

title: Help me find import export tools
content: Tools > ImportExportTools NG > Import MBOX file, select the 2GB MBOX file [web:4].
creator: Rachel.a.bowman10

title: I can not send out emails from Thunderbird.
content: I can not send out emails from Thunderbird. I get the following message "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) mail.xxxx.ca timed out. Try again." I have not been able to find an answer to this problem. I hope you can help. Please note I am a Senior so please be patient with me. Thanks, Al
creator: retired_cga
